title: Returning to a Godly Perspective on Sex and Romance, Part 6
itunes:author: John Fuller & Greg Smalley
itunes:summary:
God designed sex to connect you with your spouse, but many today have allowed the internet to abuse their view of sexuality. John, Greg and Erin explain how couples can see sex as God's gift for their marriage. Featuring Levi Lusko.

Receive the book Swipe Right for your donation of any amount!

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY
